common.studentDescription: I'm here to learn and grow my knowledge, and experience in the medical field.
common.traineeDescription: I'm gaining hands-on experience and building practical skills in medicine.
common.expertDescription: I'm looking to teach, mentor, and share my expertise with others in the medical community.
common.researcherDescription: I'm an experienced professional looking to expand my knowledge in the medical field.

auth.preRegisterDescription: Join the biggest community of experts and learners, share your knowledge and learn from others all over the world.

hero.title: Forget the old rules. Learn skills from the best. Now. Here.
hero.description: Find opportunities for every stage of your career, control when, where and how you work, and explore different ways to make money.

experts.title: Discover our best experts
experts.description: Discover a world-class community of professionals who are redefining the way skills are shared. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to take your game to the next level, our experts are here to guide you.

categories.title: Find your path in your field
categories.description: Immerse yourself in a variety of learning opportunities designed specifically for aspiring medical professionals. Browse our expertly curated categories to find courses and resources designed to deepen your understanding of the medical field and connect you with industry experts. Unleash your potential today!

actions.digitalOnlineCoursesDescription: Connect directly with industry professionals to gain personalized insights and hands-on guidance. Ask questions, clarify concepts, and enhance your skills with tailored support from experienced experts in your field.
actions.agenciesHiringDescription: Partner with specialized agencies to access a wealth of resources and expertise. Whether you need comprehensive training programs or project assistance, our agencies are equipped to help you achieve your goals efficiently and effectively.

explore.title: World-class training of trainees through expert guidance
explore.description: We connect trainees with a diverse network of experienced professionals across a variety of disciplines. Benefit from personalized mentoring and insights to enhance your skills and confidence in the medical field. Join us to unleash your potential today!

testimonials.title: What our students say!
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from students who gained valuable skills, insights and connections from our experts.
